Posts.Content: Hubris alert here. :) I'd reported that B6 and duloxetine did wonders for the pain after my first chemo. Would like to say at this point that they didn't do diddlysquat after chemos # 2 and 3. Oh well. Never mind.
Posts.Title: leg and knee pain during chemo

Posts.Content: Hubris alert here. :) I'd reported that B6 and duloxetine did wonders for the pain after my first chemo. Would like to say at this point that they didn't do diddlysquat after chemos # 2 and 3. Oh well. Never mind.
Posts.Title: leg and knee pain during chemo

Posts.Content: I've just had my first chemo (taxol and carboplatin) and had leg pain that was keeping me awake for 5 hours in the middle of the night. My oncologist gave me a shot of B12, and I take a B6 and Cymbalta (duloxetine) daily. I have been pain-free for the two weeks since I started that.
